basics.name: Juha Palmu
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I'm a full stack engineer with 10 years of experience, primarily focused on backend development, though I also handle frontend tasks when needed. I'm passionate about learning new technologies and best practices. Sustainability and maintainability are core values in my approach to coding.

work.name: Compile Oy
highlights: Developed and maintained HR software for a client, using .NET technologies
Improved the codebase for readability and ease of feature implementation
Created internal tools for visualizing consultant projects, using React and GraphQL
work.summary: Worked on both internal and client projects. Client projects were primarily backend-focused, with occasional DevOps work using Jenkins. Internal projects involved frontend development and deploying solutions to AWS.

work.name: Digia
highlights: Java
Docker
Implemented CI/CD tools for testing, versioning, and deployment, enhancing team productivity
Improved team efficiency by eliminating heavy local environments that relied on virtual machines
work.summary: Worked in a Scrum team, primarily focused on enhancing the work of other teams by implementing automation solutions and improving slow development practices.

work.name: Elisa Automate
highlights: Kotlin
React
Developed frontend and backend features for network operations center automations, reducing manual tasks and increasing efficiency
work.summary: Part of an international Scrum team, focusing on automation solutions for foreign telecom operators.

work.name: Digia
highlights: Led version control and CI/CD tool migration
Developed REST APIs for member registry software
Implemented end-to-end tests to improve quality assurance
work.summary: A backend-focused role with a DevOps component. Migrated version control from SVN to Git, and CI/CD from Bamboo to GitLab CI/CD. Created documentation and guides to support onboarding across multiple teams with minimal downtime.

work.name: Hintaseuranta
highlights: Developed web scrapers to retrieve customer pricing data, helping users find the best product prices
Created rules for automatic product categorization to reduce manual labor
work.summary: Worked as a solo developer, independently solving challenges. Tasks varied based on whether the client provided product data or if it needed to be scraped.

work.name: Tilastokeskus - Statistics Finland
highlights: Data
.NET Framework
Streamlined data intake pipelines using microservices to handle increased load efficiently
Redesigned and implemented a geolocation database in collaboration with experts
work.summary: Worked on internal projects supporting statistical units. Mostly developed independently, with input from Scrum teams including specialists and architects who provided requirements.

work.name: Arter Oy
highlights: Java
React
Resolved performance bottlenecks affecting high-usage customers, resulting in significant improvements
work.summary: Worked as a full stack developer in an in-house ERP software team. Collaborated closely with technical support to promptly resolve customer issues, ensuring high satisfaction.

work.name: Luottokunta (Nets)
highlights: Created a wallboard solution to aggregate and display data from various systems
Enhanced testing tools for the payment terminal team, enabling replay of real transactions without manual work
Developed internal solutions to streamline processes and improve team performance
work.summary: Hired from school to join a payment terminal Scrum team. Took on tasks that brought high value but lacked time allocation within the team.
